about_the_game:
In the Piedmontese Alps, in northwest Italy from 1488, there are many villages, mounds and caves. It is there that Enzo lives, a young man traumatized by having lost his parents in one of the invasions made to the region, he is faced with rumors of a great evil coming from Rome. Furthermore, he has serious doubts about his faith, which is why these invasions have been repeated for decades. Now Enzo launches himself on a quest full of adventures, dramas, mysteries, learning, conflicts and friendships in an attempt to prevent a terrible massacre.

You will find in this game:

1 - Captivating characters, with the possibility to play their flashbacks.
2 - Setting in the mountains, caves, towns and cities.
3 - Fictional characters, but situated in a historical context.
4 - Songs made especially for the game.
5 - Deepening in themes of the biblical Christian faith.
6 - Hidden items and secret areas in different maps.
7 - Main and side quests and achievements using the quest book.
8 - Biblical studies held in churches in the villages and in special places, totaling 25 topics.

short_description: Enzo, a young man raised by his uncle, lives a peaceful life in the Piedmontese Alps, until rumors of a great evil coming from Rome at the behest of Innocent 8th come to light. The boy is involved in a great journey of faith in which friends will help him to try to avoid a terrible massacre.
